name: Flight Makes Right
description: Starfleet and the Federation have plenty of vocal critics, but sometimes the loudest voices of dissent come from within. Are you ready to step in when one ex-cadet's displeasure becomes disaster?
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Ship Battles in one Phase, and Supply Missions in another Phase.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Projector Spock, Ephraim and Dot, any version of Locarno, Pike, Thelin, Uhura, crew from The Animated Series, Lower Decks, or Very Short Treks will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Supply Missions.
-- Using the U.S.S. Cerritos, the U.S.S. Thunderchild, or the Nova Class Ship will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2!
-- Every Ship Battle or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Projector Spock, Ephraim and Dot, Locarno, Pike, Thelin, Uhura, or animated crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Ortegas
featured_crew.flavor: After getting an entire bottle of Orion delaq, Ortegas makes authentic Orion Hurricanes for everyone for Pike's birthday party.

action.name: Caras Gave Us a Bottle of Real Orion Delaq

featured_crew.name: Pike
featured_crew.flavor: Pike realizes his birthday might be better spent with friends and decides to enjoy his own surprise party.

action.name: Maybe I Should Celebrate With My Friends

rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

ship.flavor: Designed for short-term missions of science and exploration. Features advanced sensor arrays.

ship.name: U.S.S. Cerritos
ship.flavor: The U.S.S. Cerritos is a California-class engineering and operations support cruiser that endured many perilous events, but kept going, against all odds.

ship.name: U.S.S. Thunderchild
ship.flavor: This 24th century Akira-class ship incorporates a multitude of tactical systems mainly focused on battle scenarios. In the wrong hands, it could be a deadly weapon.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Ortegas
rewards.flavor: After getting an entire bottle of Orion delaq, Ortegas makes authentic Orion Hurricanes for everyone for Pike's birthday party.

rewards.name: Pike
rewards.flavor: Pike realizes his birthday might be better spent with friends and decides to enjoy his own surprise party.

action.name: Maybe I Should Celebrate With My Friends

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!
